post:
Fiber Elephant is proud to present the following promotions:

$10 off 4 life
Code: 10off4life

Free Additional 256MB Memory
Code: free256mb

Free Additional 50GB Storage
Code: free50gb

All VPS are fully-managed, hosted on quad core Intel servers with Virtuozzo Containers 4.0 & We NEVER oversell.

Check us out at: http://fiberelephant.com/
If you don't see a plan that meets your needs please contact us for a custom quote: http://fiberelephant.com/contact.html
We'll garentee not only memory, but CPU too! Don't get hosted with 30 others on a bogged down VPS node, instead try us out on the SoftLayer network with no more than 10 VPS per server
